title: if you could choose...
body:
if you could choose for your team to start with all level 18 and 20k gold each but no towers or start with all level 1 and 475 gold each but all towers with 10x hp which would you choose?

edit: you choose one and the other team gets the other and you cant choose karthus if you in the level 18 team

replies.body:
Have you tried backdooring a nexus before?

It's not easy.

easy
lv 18 with 20k gold
1 person defend and the rest push

even if the towers are tanky, you can easily dive those lv1's

its so easy
but if it was life or death, id go 20k @18 for that viktor lazer

Don't we already start games at level 1? Are you saying the enemy team would get the other option, because if not, I'd 100% take the 10x hp towers, because it's exactly like the current game, except for more tower health.
Dafuq why would u choose any
um.... so either 2 hour game. or an instant win on teamfight? why would you choose any
